clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For nutritional supplementation also for treating dietary shortage or imbalance

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Spermine is a polyamine It is an organic molecule that is involved in cellular metabolism

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Choline is combined with Spermine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Nicotine is combined with Spermine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Reserpine is combined with Spermine
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Nelfinavir is combined with Spermine
